name: London
description: Historic city with a rich culture. Visit the iconic Big Ben, explore Buckingham Palace, and enjoy the multicultural cuisine.

name: Paris
description: The City of Love awaits with the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre, and delicious croissants.

name: Rome
description: Explore the Colosseum, the Trevi Fountain, and delight in pasta and pizza.

name: New York
description: The city that never sleeps offers Times Square, the Statue of Liberty, and a vibrant nightlife.

name: Tokyo
description: Immerse yourself in Japanese culture, visit the Meiji Shrine and try sushi.

name: Barcelona
description: Enjoy Gaud√≠'s architecture, relax on Barceloneta beach and try paella.

name: Sydney
description: Visit the Sydney Opera House, explore the harbour and enjoy the beaches.

name: Rio de Janeiro
description: Enjoy Carnival, visit Christ the Redeemer and relax on Copacabana and Ipanema beaches.

name: Marrakech
description: Explore the Medina, visit the Koutoubia Mosque and try tagine.

name: Budapest
description: Admire the Hungarian Parliament, relax in the thermal baths and try goulash.

name: Dublin
description: Visit the Guinness Storehouse, explore Dublin Castle and enjoy traditional Irish music.

name: Prague
description: Admire the Charles Bridge, visit Prague Castle and try Czech beer.

name: Amsterdam
description: Explore the canals, visit the Anne Frank House and experience the unique culture.
